name: SD SMS Master
author: Sverigedemokraterna IT

sections.description:
This plugin is a part of the SD SMS Master package. It connects to an SD SMS Master and can:

  • populate the database and create a new admin user
  • view the status of the master
  • add / remove / edit orders
  • add / remove / edit phones
  • add / remove / edit slaves
  • add / remove / edit users

Full documentation can be found by downloading the lib part from the plugin site and generating the API docs.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip and copy the zip contents (including directory) into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.2 2013-03-18

  • Fix: Update GIT clone/pull code and repository location.

1.1 2013-03-15

  • New: Display config info
  • Fix: Order error logs are paragraphized

1.0 2013-03-14

  • Initial release

short_description: Connects to an SD SMS Master and can install and configure slaves and phones, create and monitor orders.
